noun.description: The end of a hammer head opposite the face, typically wedge-shaped, curved, or spherical.

verb.description: Strike with a hammer or the peen of a hammer.
examples: each run of weld is peened before the next run is applied

origin: Early 16th century (as a verb): probably of Scandinavian origin; compare with Swedish dialect pena (ut), Danish dialect pene (ud) beat (out).
